author: Naomi Powell
title: Shockproofing Canada: Here’s what it will take to reopen the economy
description: 'Long fight' ahead with country needing massive increase in testing and significant overhaul in how infectious disease data is collected and shared
content: Canada needs to become more secure by becoming more self-sufficient. In a new series Strong & Free: Shockproofing Canada the Post examines how a country made wealthy by globalization and trade can also protect itself against pandemics and other unknown fu… [+7406 chars]
